attributes.action: Only EU Country where diesel is more than petrol
attributes.additional_details:
There are only 3 countries in the EU where diesel is more than petrol.  The reason being you get more miles per litre of diesel. I propose the government stop taxing diesel car users and reduce diesel to below petrol.  Just because you get more for your money doesnt mean to say we need taxing on it.

check http://www.drive-alive.co.uk/fuel_prices_europe.html for the fuel prices
